bill.title: Mississippi Community Health Center Grant Program; establish in the State Department of Health.
bill.description: An Act To Establish A Mississippi Community Health Center Grant Program In The State Department Of Health For Purpose Of Making Grants To Certain Centers To Increase Access To Care To Uninsured Or Medically Indigent Patients In Mississippi; To Provide For Grant Funds To Be Disbursed To A Center In The Northern, Central And Southern Regions Of The State And To Prescribe The Programs For Which Grant Funds May Be Used; To Amend Section 43-13-117, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase Medicaid Reimbursement To The Community Health Centers; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Appropriations
